docs.snippet: Bud Norris pitched three shutout innings in his second start of the spring, and the Baltimore Orioles beat the Boston Red Sox 7-3 on Saturday in the first of two split squad games between the teams....
docs.lead_paragraph: Bud Norris pitched three shutout innings in his second start of the spring, and the Baltimore Orioles beat the Boston Red Sox 7-3 on Saturday in the first of two split squad games between the teams.

headline.main: Norris Pitches Well as Orioles Beat Red Sox 7-3
headline.print_headline: Norris Pitches Well as Orioles Beat Red Sox 7-3

docs.snippet: On Saturday, O’Driscoll will make history in his home city by starting for Ireland against Italy, his 140th international appearance....
docs.lead_paragraph: On Saturday, O’Driscoll will make history in his home city by starting for Ireland against Italy, his 140th international appearance.

docs.snippet: Nate Schierholtz hit a two-run homer and made a diving catch for the Chicago Cubs in their 9-0 victory over the Cincinnati Reds on Saturday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Nate Schierholtz hit a two-run homer and made a diving catch for the Chicago Cubs in their 9-0 victory over the Cincinnati Reds on Saturday.

headline.main: Nate Schierholtz's Homer Powers Cubs Past Reds 9-0
headline.print_headline: Nate Schierholtz's Homer Powers Cubs Past Reds 9-0

docs.snippet: On the same track where Breeders' Cup glory has eluded him, Game On Dude won the $750,000 Santa Anita Handicap by 1¾ lengths Saturday, becoming the first three-time champion in the race's 77-year history....
docs.lead_paragraph: On the same track where Breeders' Cup glory has eluded him, Game On Dude won the $750,000 Santa Anita Handicap by 1¾ lengths Saturday, becoming the first three-time champion in the race's 77-year history.

headline.main: Game On Dude Wins 3rd Santa Anita Handicap
headline.print_headline: Game On Dude Wins 3rd Santa Anita Handicap

docs.snippet: Jose Bautista hit his third home run of the spring for the Toronto Blue Jays in a 4-3 victory Saturday over the Minnesota Twins, who got three scoreless innings from newcomer Phil Hughes....
docs.lead_paragraph: Jose Bautista hit his third home run of the spring for the Toronto Blue Jays in a 4-3 victory Saturday over the Minnesota Twins, who got three scoreless innings from newcomer Phil Hughes.

headline.main: Jose Bautista Homers, Blue Jays Beat Twins 4-3
headline.print_headline: Jose Bautista Homers, Blue Jays Beat Twins 4-3
